Hi,

I am using SURTScope but I am facing a problem while seed is 
redierct=
ed to some other URL....

Here I am using 

SurtPrefixScope: 

surts-source=
-file: Not provided
seeds-as-surt-prefixes: True
surts-dump-file: dump.txt
=
also-check-via: False

if my seed is www.xyz.com and it is redirected to th=
e www.abc.com
then It does not crawl www.abc.com

But I need www.abc.com to=
 be crawled...

Or even my seed contains pqr.com and inturn it redirects to=
 the 
www.pqr.com then also it does not crawl www.pqr.com in same 
situatio=
n...
